about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I’m a professional photographer and editor, passionate about capturing authentic moments and telling visual stories with emotion and depth.
about.paragraph2: I edit with a focus on natural tones and clean aesthetics, enhancing each image to reflect its true mood — never overprocessed, always intentional.
about.webDesignDescription: I create modern, responsive websites using tools like React and CSS Modules, blending clean code with thoughtful design to build digital spaces that work.
